amendment.description: Amendment authorizes the Coast Guard to acquire 7 PC-170 coastal patrol craft for drug interdiction and provides for the improvement of shore facilities for drug interdiction operations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to authorize the acquisition of 7 PC-170 coastal patrol craft for drug interdiction and provide for the improvement of shore facilities for drug interdiction operations.
